001package Calibration_Demos;
002
003import java.awt.Color;
004import java.awt.geom.Point2D;
005
006import ij.IJ;
007import ij.ImagePlus;
008import ij.ImageStack;
009import ij.io.LogStream;
010import ij.plugin.PlugIn;
011import ij.process.ColorProcessor;
012import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
013import imagingbook.calibration.data.zhang.CalibrationImage;
014import imagingbook.calibration.data.zhang.ZhangData;
015import imagingbook.calibration.zhang.Calibrator;
016import imagingbook.calibration.zhang.Calibrator.Parameters;
017import imagingbook.calibration.zhang.Camera;
018import imagingbook.calibration.zhang.ViewTransform;
019import imagingbook.calibration.zhang.util.GridPainter;
020import imagingbook.common.math.PrintPrecision;
021import imagingbook.core.resource.ImageResource;
022
023/**
024 * This plugin performs Zhang's camera calibration on the
025 * pre-calculated point data for the N given target views.
026 * Based on the estimated intrinsic and extrinsic (view)
027 * parameters, the corner points of the 3D target model are
028 * then projected onto the corresponding calibration images
029 * (a stack).
030 * All rendering is done by pixel drawing (no graphic overlays).
031 * 
032 * @author W. Burger
033 * @version 2022/04/14
034 */
035public class Demo_Zhang_Calibration implements PlugIn {
036        
037        private static boolean DEBUG = true;
038        private static ImageResource resource = CalibrationImage.CalibImageStack_tif;   // = "CalibImageStack.tif"
039        
040        private static boolean ShowObservedModelPoints = true;          // draw observed image points into a new stack
041        private static boolean ShowProjectedImagePoints = true;         // draw projected image points into the test image stack
042        private static boolean ListCameraViews = true;
043        
044        private static Color BackGroundColor = Color.white;
045        
046        static {
047                LogStream.redirectSystem();
048                PrintPrecision.set(6);
049        }
050        
051        public void run(String arg0) {
052                ImagePlus testIm = resource.getImage();
053                if (testIm == null) {
054                        IJ.error("Could not open calibration images!"); 
055                        return;
056                }
057                
058                int M = testIm.getNSlices();    // number of views
059                if (M < 2) {
060                        IJ.error("Image must be a stack with 2+ images!"); 
061                        return;
062                }
063                
064                testIm.show();
065                int width = testIm.getWidth();
066                int height = testIm.getHeight();
067                Point2D[] modelPoints = ZhangData.getModelPoints();
068                Camera camReal = ZhangData.getCameraIntrinsics();
069                if (DEBUG) {
070                        System.out.println("Camera intrinsics (reference from EasyCalib):");
071                        System.out.println(camReal.toString());
072                }
073                
074//              ViewTransform[] viewsReal = ZhangData.getAllViewTransforms();   
075                Point2D[][] obsPoints     = ZhangData.getAllObservedPoints();
076                        
077                if (ShowObservedModelPoints){
078                        ImageStack stack = new ImageStack(width, height);
079                        drawSquares(stack, obsPoints);
080                        new ImagePlus("Observed points", stack).show();
081                }
082                
083                // Set up calibrator ------------------------------------------
084                
085                Parameters params = new Calibrator.Parameters();
086                params.normalizePointCoordinates = true;
087                params.lensDistortionKoeffients = 2;
088                params.useNumericJacobian = true;
089                params.debug = DEBUG;
090                
091                Calibrator zcalib = new Calibrator(params, modelPoints);
092                for (int i = 0; i < M; i++) {
093                        zcalib.addView(obsPoints[i]);
094                }
095                
096                // Perform calibration ------------------------------------------
097                
098                Camera camFinal = zcalib.calibrate();
099                if (camFinal == null) {
100                        System.out.println("calibration failed");
101                        return;
102                }
103                
104                // Show results ------------------------------------------
105                
106                System.out.println("Camera intrinsics (final estimate):");
107                System.out.println(camFinal.toString());
108                
109                ViewTransform[] finalViews = zcalib.getFinalViews();
110                System.out.format("Final (squared) projection error: %.3f\n", zcalib.getProjectionError(camFinal, finalViews, obsPoints));
111                                
112                if (ListCameraViews) {
113                        for (int i = 0; i < M; i++) {
114                                System.out.println("**** View " + i + ": ****");
115                                System.out.println(finalViews[i].toString());
116                        }
117                }
118                
119                if (ShowProjectedImagePoints) {
120                        Point2D[][] projPoints = new Point2D[M][];
121                        for (int i = 0; i < M; i++) {
122                                projPoints[i] = camFinal.project(finalViews[i], modelPoints);
123                        }
124                        drawSquares(testIm.getStack(), projPoints);
125                        testIm.updateAndDraw();
126                }
127        }
128        
129        // --------------------------------------------------------------------
130        
131        /**
132         * Draws the array of image points to a given (possibly empty) stack image.
133         * The image points are assumed to be the corners of the standard
134         * calibration model, i.e., 4 consecutive points form a projected square.
135         * @param stack a stack with M images (views)
136         * @param imagePoints a sequence of 2D point sets, one for each view
137         */
138        private void drawSquares(ImageStack stack, Point2D[][] imagePoints) {
139                final int width = stack.getWidth();
140                final int height = stack.getHeight();
141                int M = imagePoints.length;
142                for (int i = 0; i < M; i++) {
143                        ImageProcessor ip;
144                        if (stack.getSize() > i) {      // use existing stack slice
145                                ip = stack.getProcessor(i + 1);
146                        }
147                        else {                                          // create and fill new slice
148                                ip = new ColorProcessor(width, height);
149                                if (BackGroundColor != null) {
150                                        ip.setColor(BackGroundColor);
151                                        ip.fill();
152                                }
153                                stack.addSlice("View" + i, ip);
154                        }
155                        GridPainter painter = new GridPainter(ip);
156                        painter.drawSquares(imagePoints[i]);
157                }
158        }
159        
160}
